title: Therapedic® Mattress Topper
transcripts:
Not ready to part with your mattress? A Therapedic memory foam mattress topper is a great way to improve the feel of your existing mattress, it adds a new layer of comfort and support, molding to your body and equally supporting all parts so there are no pressure points to cause pain and soreness.

 When selecting a Therapedic mattress topper, consider how much cushion your body needs and the firmness or softness of your underlying mattress. All Therapedic toppers feature high quality materials and high density foams that are performance tested.  Comfortable sleep starts with the Therapedic one-and-a-half inch memory touch mattress topper. It may be the thinnest mattress topper we make, but its big on comfort. Made with one-and-a-half inches of high density memory touch foam, it adjusts to your bodys contours and features a moisture wicking cover to keep your body comfortable while you sleep with odor neutralizing technology.

Need more cushioning? The Therapedic two-inch memory touch comfort mattress topper is the next step up. This topper features two full inches of high density anti-microbial memory touch foam, a moisture wicking cover and odor neutralizing technology.

 For those who prefer even more cushioning comfort and a cooler sleep experience, the Therapedic three-inch memory touch mattress topper is the best of both worlds. With its unique cooling technology, Therapedics three-inch memory touch not only adjusts to your bodys contours, it provides a cooler sleeping environment and breathability for greater airflow. It also includes antimicrobial protection and odor-eliminating technology.

If you are a temperature sensitive sleeper, either hot or cold  or somewhere in between, consider the Therapedic two-inch memory gel mattress enhancer. Similar to traditional memory foam, this two-inch topper offers top-of-the-line comfort with temperature regulating technology to balance sleeping temperature, micro-gel beads to provide personalized support, and odor neutralizing features, with a Nano-Tex cover and a 10-year warranty. This is an ideal mattress topper for either hot or cold sleepers.

 To complete your bed set, see our videos on choosing the right mattress pad and pillow for you!
